name: CPU Turbo Button
description: Toggle between standard and turbo clock speeds. Multiplies click power by 1.5x.

name: Keyboard Macro Command
description: Program repetitive actions into a single keystroke. Multiplies click power by 2x.

name: Assembly Optimization
description: Hand-crafted assembly code for maximum efficiency. Multiplies click power by 3x.

name: SIMD Instructions
description: Single Instruction, Multiple Data operations. Multiplies click power by 5x.

name: GPU Acceleration
description: Offloads processing to the graphics card. Multiplies click power by 10x.
